title: Set up a detail with fields

code_examples.code: define("UsrSchemac6fd3fd0Detail", [], function() {    return {        entitySchemaName: "UsrMedDocument",        details: /**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/{}/**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/,        diff: /**SCHEMA_DIFF*/[]/**SCHEMA_DIFF*/,        methods: {            getDisplayColumns: function() {                return ["UsrSeries", "UsrNumber"];            }        }    };});
code_examples.context: View the source code of theUsrSchemac6fd3fd0Detailschema below.

code_examples.code: define("UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", ["BaseFieldRowViewModel"], function() {    Ext.define("Terrasoft.configuration.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", {        extend: "Terrasoft.BaseFieldRowViewModel",        alternateClassName: "Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel"    });    return Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel;});
code_examples.context: Add the source code in the Schema Designer. Create a module description in the source code of the schema. Define theTerrasoft.configuration.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModelclass inherited from theTerrasoft.

code_examples.code: .med-document-left-row-container {    .t-label {        color: blue;    }}.field-detail-row {    width: 100;    display: inline-flex;    margin-bottom: 10px;    .field-detail-row-left {        display: flex;        flex-wrap: wrap;                .control-width-15 {            min-width: 300px;            width: 50;            margin-bottom: 5px;        }    }    .field-detail-row-left.singlecolumn {        width: 50%;    }}
code_examples.context: Go to theLESSnode of the object structure and set up the needed visual styles of the detail.

code_examples.code: define("UsrSchemac6fd3fd0Detail", ["UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", "css!UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel"], function() {    return {        entitySchemaName: "UsrMedDocument",        details: /**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/{}/**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/,        diff: /**SCHEMA_DIFF*/ [], /**SCHEMA_DIFF*/        methods: {            getDisplayColumns: function() {                return ["UsrSeries", "UsrNumber"];            },            getRowViewModelClassName: function() {                return "Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel";            },            getLeftRowContainerWrapClass: function() {                return ["med-document-left-row-container", "field-detail-row"];            }        }    };});
code_examples.context: View the source code of the modified schema below.

code_examples.code: define("UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", ["BaseFieldRowViewModel", "UsrMedDocumentRowViewModelResources"], function(resources) {    Ext.define("Terrasoft.configuration.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", {        extend: "Terrasoft.BaseFieldRowViewModel",        alternateClassName: "Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel",        validateNumberMoreThenZero: function(columnValue) {            var invalidMessage ="";            if (columnValue < 0) {                invalidMessage = resources.localizableStrings.NumberMustBeGreaterThenZeroMessage;            }            return {                fullInvalidMessage: invalidMessage,                invalidMessage: invalidMessage            };        },        setValidationConfig: function() {            this.addColumnValidator("UsrNumber", this.validateNumberMoreThenZero);        },        init: function() {            this.callParent(arguments);            this.setValidationConfig();        }    });    return Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel;});
code_examples.context: View the source code of the modified schema below.

code_examples.code: define("UsrSchemac6fd3fd0Detail", ["UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel", "css!UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel"], function() {    return {        entitySchemaName: "UsrMedDocument",        details: /**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/{}/**SCHEMA_DETAILS*/,        diff: /**SCHEMA_DIFF*/ [], /**SCHEMA_DIFF*/        methods: {            getDisplayColumns: function() {                return ["UsrSeries", "UsrNumber"];            },            getRowViewModelClassName: function() {                return "Terrasoft.UsrMedDocumentRowViewModel";            },            getLeftRowContainerWrapClass: function() {                return ["med-document-left-row-container", "field-detail-row"];            },            useVirtualRecord: function() {                return true;            }        }    };});
code_examples.context: View the source code of the modified schema below.

callouts.title: Warning
callouts.content: ImportantFor Financial Services Creatio product lineup, use theBaseFieldsDetailschema of theBaseFinancepackage to set up details with fields. This package is available only in Financial Services Creatio product lineup.
callouts.html:
Important

For Financial Services Creatio product lineup, use the BaseFieldsDetail schema of the BaseFinance package to set up details with fields. This package is available only in Financial Services Creatio product lineup.

callouts.title: Medical documents
callouts.content: ExampleImplement theMedical documentscustom detail with theNumberandSeriesvirtual fields. Add the detail to theHistorytab of the contact page. The value of theNumberfield cannot be negative. Render the detail field names blue.
callouts.html:
Example

Implement the Medical documents custom detail with the Number and Series virtual fields. Add the detail to the History tab of the contact page. The value of the Number field cannot be negative. Render the detail field names blue.
